record.description: [Reception following the delivery by John Hope Franklin (John Matthews Manly Distinguished Service Professor in the department of History, University of Chicago) of the Jefferson Lecture in the Humanities for 1976, "Racial Equality in America."]. Mrs. Aurelia Whittington Franklin (center background); to her right, John Hope Franklin.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Contact print and negative on file Series III Jefferson Lectures Franklin : Contact Prints and Negatives, barcode # 47869734.
